title: Customize Design header :  Error: Parse error on line 1
body:
A tiny bug, if we go into "code mode" (powered by ace), while the header is empty this displays an error message.

Error: Parse error on line 1: ^ Expecting 'STRING', 'NUMBER', 'NULL', 'TRUE', 'FALSE', '{', '[', got 'EOF'

xxx/settings/customize_design?design_id=11#header

title: subscription cancellation not possible
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? ie v4.5.25 / v5.0.30**
v5.3.39-C68

**What environment are you running?**
Docker
Shared Hosting

**Have you checked log files (storage/logs/) Please provide redacted output**
No logs fo far 

**Have you searched existing issues?**
yes

**Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting?**
no

**Describe the bug**
When Allow Cancellation is enabled for subscriptions, there is no cancellation option shown in the client portal.

**Steps To Reproduce**
1. Create new subscription
2. Enable "Allow Cancellation"
3. Use the Subscription link to purchase this subscription
4. Pay
5. Go to the subscriptions section in the client portal
6. View the subscription
--> No cancellation option shown

**Expected behavior**
Cancellation button is shown


**(v5) Can you replicate the issue on our demo site? https://demo.invoiceninja.com**
On the demo instance it is not possible to purchase a subscription.

title: 400: React App Not Installed, Please install the React app before attempting to switch.
body:
Before posting please check our "Troubleshooting" category in the docs: 
https://invoiceninja.github.io/docs/self-host-troubleshooting/ 

THIS URL ABOVE DOESN'T EXIST! (Troubleshooting)

## Setup
- Version: v5.10.4-C160
- Environment: Kubernetes self-hosted

When I click on the "Web App" (switch to) button top right, after it asks "are you sure?" the resulting error is:

"400: React App Not Installed, Please install the React app before attempting to switch."

And the switch fails. I can't find this aspect documented anywhere, or even any mention of React functionality, let alone switching to it. I don't yet see why this is failing, let alone documented.

I don't know what version I was on, maybe one or two months old, but this "Web App" switch to button only showed up after pulling the latest dockerhub image over the weekend (yesterday?). So I went to read the release notes for the last few months and have not seen anything that looks to overlap with this now showing up.

I think this is a bug.

title: Clients Statement using the wrong client name and address
body:
### Discussed in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/discussions/10350
Originally posted by **webma5ter23** December 7, 2024 Hello When in the Clients page I click on action button to view statement. It will produce a pdf view with the correct clients invoice history, but the clients information section shows a different client name and address. The issue happens on all clients I try, correct financial information but uses the same wrong client name and address. Any idea?

title: Deleted Client
body: I deleted a test client with invoices and credits associated to the client. When client was deleted the credits remained but the invoices were gone. On the dashboard however it still shows the deleted invoices and includes those numbers in the average invoice and upcoming invoices. The Total Revenue, Billed Client and Invoice Sent charts were correct.

title: Markdown Problem in invoice positions
body:
<!-- Before posting please check our "Troubleshooting" category in the docs: 
https://invoiceninja.github.io/en/self-host-troubleshooting/ -->

## Setup
- Version: v5.11.59
- Environment: Shared Hosting


## Describe the bug
In Version 5.11.50 and before, i was able to use markdown for headlines like this:
```
## headline

description
```

As of 5.11.58 the whole text is now a headline 2

### Steps To Reproduce
use markdown for h2 and add some text next line or the line after

title: Flutter-web-app: Invoice with draft-status are shown in payment as appliable invoices, but give error when being tried to applied
body:
<!-- Before posting please check our "Troubleshooting" category in the docs: 
https://invoiceninja.github.io/docs/self-host-troubleshooting/ -->

## Setup
- Version: v5.8.21-C153
- Environment: Docker

## Interface
- Flutter: [x]
- React: []
- Both: []

## Checklist
- Can you replicate the issue on our v5 demo site https://demo.invoiceninja.com or https://react.invoicing.co/demo? YES
- Have you searched existing issues? YES
- Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting? NO
- Have you inspected the logs in storage/logs/laravel.log for any errors? NO

## Describe the bug
Important: Settings -> Payment Settings -> Admin Initiated Payments must be ON
If you create an admin-initiated payment and you wanna apply it to an invoice, invoice-drafts will be shown as potential applyable invoices. But if you select one and you want to click on apply, the following error message arrives. In the react-app the draft is not selectable. I guess, this is a bug in flutter-web-app.

### Steps To Reproduce
Create an invoice-draft, create a non-applied payment, and after saving the payment try to apply it to an invoice.

### Expected Behavior
I guess the draft should not be shown as an apply-selector.

## Additional context
Nope.

### Screenshots
![Bildschirmfoto vom 2024-02-02 10-37-58](https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/assets/140073251/3290aeb7-5c77-4b98-b7ef-58abdcc9f6ff)


### Logs
Sorry, no log-files.
```

```

title: Setup and System Settings are not adding quotes when needed
body:
The Setup and System Settings pages are not adding the quotes when the value contains spaces and makes the application unusable.

Example:  If the field "From Name" contains spaces, you need to manually edit the .env file each time you change a settings.

title: Extraneous decimal zeros showing up in Tax Rates

When setting up a tax rate of, say, `15%`, it displays on invoices as `15.000%`.

Can they be removed?

title: Credit Card payment: "Name" should be Holder or "Card holder name"
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? ie v4.5.25 / v5.0.30** 5.3.84

**What environment are you running?** ZIP

**Have you checked log files (storage/logs/) Please provide redacted output** N/A

**Have you searched existing issues?** Yes

**Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting?** No

**Describe the bug**
When using online payments (here with Stripe), the credit card form shows up.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3702203/165920338-e2db469a-176f-454d-bcc4-b7449080769c.png)

The "Name" here is quite confusing to some customers. The correct term would be "Credit card holder" or "Card holder name" or something like this. 

The texts actually already show the correct terminology:

```
ckadm@mintp ~/Git/infiniroot/invoiceninja/resources/lang $ grep "cardholder_name" * -rni
ar/texts.php:4309:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
ca/texts.php:4304:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
cs/texts.php:4309:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
da/texts.php:4308:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
de/texts.php:4311:    'cardholder_name' => 'Name des Karteninhabers',
el/texts.php:4309:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
en/texts.php:4277:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
es/texts.php:4307:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
es_ES/texts.php:4299:    'cardholder_name' => 'Titular de la tarjeta',
et/texts.php:4274:    'cardholder_name' => 'Kaardi valdaja nimi',
fa/texts.php:4309:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
fi/texts.php:4309:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
fr/texts.php:4303:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
fr_CA/texts.php:4301:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
hr/texts.php:4310:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
it/texts.php:4312:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
ja/texts.php:4309:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
lt/texts.php:4309:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
lv_LV/texts.php:4309:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
mk_MK/texts.php:4310:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
nb_NO/texts.php:4309:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
nl/texts.php:4301:    'cardholder_name' => 'Naam kaarthouder',
pl/texts.php:4306:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
pt_BR/texts.php:4303:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
pt_PT/texts.php:4306:    'cardholder_name' => 'Nome no cartão',
ro/texts.php:4311:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
ru_RU/texts.php:4310:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
sk/texts.php:4306:    'cardholder_name' => 'Držiteľ karty',
sl/texts.php:4306:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
sq/texts.php:4307:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
sr/texts.php:4309:    'cardholder_name' => 'Ime vlasnika kartice',
sv/texts.php:4316:    'cardholder_name' => 'Kortinnehavarens namn',
th/texts.php:4311:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
tr_TR/texts.php:4308:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
zh_TW/texts.php:4306:    'cardholder_name' => 'Card holder name',
```

It seems that the credit card form is not showing the correct variable `cardholder_name`.


**Steps To Reproduce**
Add a payment gateway with credit card payment. 
In customer portal select an invoice and select Pay Now -> Credit Card
The Credit Card form shows up.


**Expected behavior**
"Name" should be shown with the correct terminology using the `cardholder_name` variable.

title: React Web interface shows a blank page on 5.7.17 update
body:
<!-- Before posting please check our "Troubleshooting" category in the docs: 
https://invoiceninja.github.io/docs/self-host-troubleshooting/ -->

## Setup
- Version: [5.7.17](https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/releases/tag/v5.7.17)
- Environment: Self-Hosted, Debian 12 (nginx/1.22.1, 10.11.3-MariaDB, PHP 8.2.7)

## Checklist
- I checked laravel.log for errors, but there were no entries for today except autobilling.

## Describe the bug
After updating to 5.7.17 on the flutter interface, I press the react web interface button. The page refreshed and is now blank. I rebooted the VM, still blank. I switch from Firefox to Chromium, still blank. 

To return to a functional state, I invoked 'UPDATE accounts SET set_react_as_default_ap = 0;' in the database. Now it is showing the flutter interface again. I tried the react interface again and it was blank. Laravel.log doesn't report anything.

Last known working update was 5.7.14.

## Notes from bug author
- What other details would be helpful to have?

title: JS Error, can't add Stripe bank account
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? ie v4.5.25 / v5.0.30**
v5.1.62

**What environment are you running?**
Shared Hosting

**Describe the bug**
When trying to add a bank account as a payment method in the client portal for the stripe payment gateway, stripe-ach.js throws an error preventing the form from being submitted. The error states `Cannot read property 'content' of null` for the line `this.stripe_connect = document.querySelector('meta[name="stripe-account-id"]').content`.

There are no errors in either the stripe dashboard logs nor the invoice ninja stripe logs, no message is displayed to user, form does not submit and JS error is present in browser console before trying to enter any data in form and pressing button.

title: Bug: Email problem with CHF
body:
There is a problem in emails templates Light and Dark (Email design in Settings) : with CHF currency the text as not enough space to fit in one line. The the currency symbol goes on a second line…

Modifying resources/views/emails/design2_html.blade.php (or design3_html) :
 - Line 15 : 600 => 700 ok !

title: Data Visualization wrong currency
body:
I have a client that is set to use USD as the currency instead of the account wide currency, SGD.  

Under 'Data Visualization' in the Settings page, the currency for the client is reflected as SGD with the amount in USD.

Is this a bug?

title: Localization of client not applied to :DATE variable
body: My `:DATE` variable is shown using the localization of the dashboard, where all other variables are translated using the localization of the client. I.e., I'll end up with descriptions such as `<dutch text> June <dutch text>`. (where the client is set to dutch, and invoiceninja itself to english)

title: v5.3.95 - Email templates preview doesn't display correctly + Server Error due to permission issues
body:
Just updated to v5.3.95 and now I'm getting 500: Internal Server error when going to email an invoice and my email template preview is totally screwed up. It seems that the company logo is being shown with full dimensions and not being scaled down like it was before this update and at one point...the client portal loaded up in the preview? Not sure what the heck is going on there.

The actual template in the received email looks normal. It's only the preview that now isn't accurate to the actual template.


![Screenshot 2022-06-04 101307](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52687659/171968951-01e6fba3-e2c9-4d7e-a883-9242002e25ec.png)

![Screenshot 2022-06-04 103817](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52687659/171969640-b61e8baf-f435-4ee1-81e4-4e40a0c51956.png)


Why did the client portal load up in the email preview on one attempt?
![Screenshot 2022-06-04 101119](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52687659/171968947-f67d8605-b812-453b-9ca4-33e60d835a20.png)

Actual email:
![Screenshot 2022-06-04 102559](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52687659/171969158-868a3ac0-dcd5-452e-b6d8-68f75f17d3cc.png)



Laravel log attached. 

[laravel.log](https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/files/8836267/laravel.log)

Error 500 Seems to be caused by the same permission error again as per the last update. I posted about this here:
https://forum.invoiceninja.com/t/pdf-generation-error-500-v5-3-93-permissions-issue/10770/3

"[2022-06-04 00:16:16] production.ERROR: Downloaded Chromium binary is not executable. Make sure to set correct permissions (0755) {"userId":1,"exception":"[object] (Beganovich\\Snappdf\\Exception\\BinaryNotExecutable(code: 0): Downloaded Chromium binary is not executable. Make sure to set correct permissions (0755) at /home/techbuddy.net.au/domains/billing.techbuddy.net.au/public_html/vendor/beganovich/snappdf/src/Snappdf.php:82)
[stacktrace]"

I set my permissions for all invoice ninja files again manually and it's at least resolved the error 500 issue but something since the last few updates continues to mess up permissions via the self updater.

title: invoices mark sent even if mail sever error
body: Invoice mark as sent in invoice view even is tempoary mail error (ie 111) is in invoice view. no method to auto retry in backend and incorrectly marking as sent in front end view.

title: Alle Projects and times in listed in each customer
body:
Hello team,

since the last update to 5.10.31, all existing projects and times/tasks of all customers are displayed in each customer data record under the Projects and Times/Tasks tab and not just those that belong to the current customer that I have just called up.

We use a docker environment.

regards
Martin

title: Customer > Documents > Filter not working
body:
Hi folks,

im using customer > documents quite often, mostly with txt and pdf.
Seems to me, that filter isnt working at all at this place.
Entering a filename partly results in the entire list, regarding the choosen count 20/50/100.
This is since im using IN in jan 2025 with webui in firefox under xubuntu linux. 

Can you please fix this?!
Btw: is the filter intended to search inside txt, pdf, doc etc.? or just for filenames?

Thanks in advance
Marcel Naranjo

title: Method not translated?
body:
At /settings/reports, you can see the method of payment in the last column. In my case this is "Bank transfer", which seems to be untranslated, while this string is correctly translated to German "Überweisung" when used in the auto-suggest box at entering payments (/payments/create).

Could it be that this table uses the untranslated string? Even if there is already a translation present?

title: 0% tax does not show in totals
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? ie v4.5.25 / v5.0.30**
v5.3.55

**What environment are you running?**
Shared Hosting

**Have you searched existing issues?**
See #5942 

**Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting?**
No

**Describe the bug**
When using line item taxes, the selected taxes will not show in the totals if they are 0%. This is a problem as this is a legal requirement (as discussed in #5942). It will only show when using total taxes, which is a problem because all the old invoices I just migrated from v4 only use line item taxes.

**Expected behavior**
Show the 0% tax with the tax title in the totals table when using 0% tax in the line items

**(v5) Can you replicate the issue on our demo site? https://demo.invoiceninja.com**
Yes

title: Invoice Terms Label Shown without terms set, hidden code has no influence
body:
v5.11.18-W171

As of v5.11.17, there is this "Invoice Terms" label that is now shown on the Invoice design at all times.

Previously, if there were no terms entered, this label would not appear, and this is the expected behaviour.

I have also seen that in the includes for the invoice design there is the following line you can uncomment, but this has no effect either:

  /* Hide terms label */
  [data-ref="total_table-terms-label"] { display: none }


![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a1fc51f1-755c-40ca-b946-9eea91a59c4d)


Please return the behaviour as it was before where this would not appear if there were no terms entered, and have the hide terms label code above have the correct influence.
 
Another discussion reference to https://forum.invoiceninja.com/t/can-not-hide-invoice-terms-label/21059

title: Wrong cancel redirection in new project
body:
The cancel button in the new project view takes me to the expense categories.

Expected: The cancel button takes me to the projects view.

title: Invoice Ninja's logo still used in error page after whitebranded
body:
<!-- Before posting please check our "Troubleshooting" category in the docs: 
https://invoiceninja.github.io/docs/self-host-troubleshooting/ -->

## Setup
- Version: v5.5.70-M107
- Environment: Docker with white branding purchased

## Checklist
- Can you replicate the issue on our v5 demo site https://demo.invoiceninja.com or https://react.invoicing.co/demo? Not applicable
- Have you searched existing issues? Yes
- Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting? Negative
- Have you inspected the logs in storage/logs/laravel.log for any errors? Yes

## Describe the bug
Invoice Ninja's logo still appears in client-facing error page when client portal is disabled.

### Steps To Reproduce
1. Disable client portal from the AdminUI
2. Navigate to an invoice URL
3. Click pay now and get directed to the desired payment gateway
4. Cancel the payment process and get directed back to the error page of Invoice Ninja. Notice that the company logo is not used.

### Expected Behavior
The company logo should be displayed instead of the default logo of Invoice Ninja

## Additional context
I tried to replace the URL using Custom JS in the Admin UI but no luck.

### Screenshots
https://i.imgur.com/v0raJcw.png

### Logs
N/A

body:

title: Unable to change user login password within GUI
body:
Running a fresh install of v5.0.41-C35 on docker-compose using nginx. I am attempting to change my password by going to Settings --> User Details --> Password and entering my new password. I then get prompted to verify my password. I assume this means my new password so I enter the same password once more. It results in a 403:"Invalid Password" error. 

When I enter my old password into the verify field it accepts it and a notification icon tells me the settings have been saved however the password has not been changed.

title: Plaid ClientID, Secret, and Public Key entry won't delete if fields contained prior data.
body:
I recently noticed that when we setup our Stripe information, we also entered in our Plaid ClientID, Secret, and Public Key.  Today, I wanted to no longer offer Plaid support, so I logged in and tried to delete the Plaid Client ID, Secret, and Public Key using the website interface (`/gateways/1/edit`).  Every time I remove the data from those three fields and hit "Save" button, the fields get repopulated with "*********".

I tried entering "1" for all three fields to see if any data was getting saved-- it did save the "1".

Running InvoiceNinja.com - v3.2.0; self hosted on Ubuntu 14.04.5 LTS.

title: v5.3.70 - White label license not working (Branding shown again in invoices/quotes)
body:
As of v5.3.70, it appears something has stopped working with the white label license. Branding is appearing in invoices, new or old, even after clearing cache folders and attempting the usual troubleshooting such as reapplying the license, php artisan optimises/cache clears, browser cache clears, etc.

I decided to create this issue because there has been another report of this and when I test with v5.3.68, this issue isn't present.

https://forum.invoiceninja.com/t/white-label-activated-branding-still-shows/10175/5
![Screenshot 2022-03-17 213811](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52687659/158899385-a92e10ea-e4f0-4c20-b180-84302629b758.png)
![Screenshot 2022-03-17 214217](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52687659/158899406-7f06d9b9-4b6d-4129-bdd9-863e40d58374.png)

title: Invoice Create - Client shows 'null' in seelct2
body:
Screenshot: https://goo.gl/THFNgv

When searching for the the dummie customer 'Vaya` for example, it shows `null` at the front.  In this case the fields are set to the following:

Organization:
    - Name: `is empty`

Contacts:
    - First Name: `Vaya Adventures`
    - Last Name: `is empty`

I'm going to assume that the json tries to return the Organization name first then the customer but in this case since there is no organization name it returns null? May I suggest perhaps we display nothing rather than `null`? I'm open to other input.

---

## Update

Seems after updating the organization name and removing the contacts first name it displays properly now. Maybe I'll put in a pull request for this..

title: 'Email preferences' in email footer broken
body:
<!-- Before posting please check our "Troubleshooting" category in the docs: 
https://invoiceninja.github.io/docs/self-host-troubleshooting/ -->

## Setup
- Version: <!-- i.e. v4.5.25 / v5.0.30 -->v5.8.19-C153
- Environment: <!-- Docker/Shared Hosting/ZIP/Other -->self hosting

## Describe the bug
<!-- A clear and concise description of the bug. -->
'Email preferences' in the email footer is broken on mobile and desktop. On desktop it is displayed as `[ ]Email preferences`, whereas on mobile it reports 'No app installed to open this.'

### Steps To Reproduce
<!-- Please list the steps to reproduce the issue. -->
1. Send an email (for example an invoice reminder) from Invoice Ninja
2. View the email
3. Result on mobile: Tapping 'Email preferences' returns 'No app installed to open this.'
4. Result on desktop: It is displayed as regular text, `[ ]Email preferences`

### Expected Behaviour
<!-- A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. -->
'Email preferences' is functional

## Additional context
<!-- Add any other context about the problem here. -->
- Email template is set to 'plain text'
- Potentially related: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9172

title: Caching of PDF Version of Invoices / Quotes. When i change something, the PDF in Invoice Ninja doesn't updated immediatly
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? ie v4.5.25 / v5.0.30**
v5.1.14-C44

**What environment are you running?**
Docker

**Have you checked log files (storage/logs/) Please provide redacted output**
No

**Have you searched existing issues?**
No

**Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting?**
No

**Describe the bug**
I often notice, that the PDF Version of Invoices / Quotes is kind of a chached Version, which doesn't reflect my current changes. This is mostly observed when i edit a Invoice, view the PDF and then keep on changing Items. Viewing the PDF after that presents me a old Version of the Invoice / Quote.

See the differences in the Screenshots below. I can reproduce the wrong PDF after 5 Minutes after the last change.

- Different Order
- Different Text for "Microsoft Surface Pro"

**Steps To Reproduce**
Will try to find the Steps, currently I don't see the pattern.

**Expected behavior**
PDF Versions in the Admin App should reflect changes as soon as they are saved.

**Screenshots**

***PDF***

title: Unable to add creditcard in customer portal
body:
`credit_card?capture=true:1091 Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'value' of null
    at HTMLFormElement.<anonymous> (credit_card?capture=true:1091)`

Which is this piece of code:
`var options = {
                address_zip: document.getElementById('postal_code').value,
            };`

But there is no postal_code field on that page.

title: OFX import broken - entering vendor fills in all fields in column
body:
After importing an OFX file, I am prompted to 'Import Expenses' by allocating a Vendor for each negative bank entry.

Currently this is broken, in that as I enter text in any 'Vendor' field, all fields in the column update (in realtime) with the same text. 

![Screenshot](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/205995/64752166-df839f80-d561-11e9-89a3-f0430f0e28a4.png)

OFX importing will be very useful once baked - particularly if records can be auto-matched to Vendors/Invoices via (e.g.) a regex pattern.

This affects 4.5.14 self-hosted and also replicable as a guest at https://app.invoiceninja.com/bank_accounts/import_ofx. I'm using Firefox 68.0 on Linux.

(New InvoiceNinja user - super impressed by the overall quality. Great work!)

title: When Archiving/Deleting Recurring Invoices, Silently Drops into Invoice Screen
body: Chalk this up as bad UX; I was attempting to delete recurring invoices, and I only had a single page. When I selected-all and clicked 'archive', it looked like the page refreshed and the screen was still full of 'active' records, so I tried deleting..and then released, too late, that I had been shifted silently to the "invoices" pane instead of the "recurring" pane. So, I just deleted a bunch of important invoice records.

title: Project list doesn't display task rate inherited from client
body:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Create a client and set as task rate
2. Create a project for that client and _don't_ set a task rate (so, it inherits the task rate from the client)
3. Look at the projects list

Actual behaviour:
`Task Rate` field is empty

Expected behaviour:
`Task Rate` field should display the client-inherited task rate

title: Can't download invoices via the client portal if the invoice has been paid
body:

Self Hosted

**Describe the bug**
Can't download invoices via the client portal if the invoice has already been paid. After selecting any invoices with the tick box then choosing download, the page displays "no items selected" even though items were selected. This is a huge problem as my clients expect they can download PDF copies of their invoice and I have to manually email them the PDF otherwise!

Selected invoices are downloaded

**Screenshots**
![noitems](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52687659/145514720-08e04fe2-8257-459c-9927-6f63cd13fc99.png)

title: [Bug] Invoice Status of "Partial" shows as Status "Overdue" In Client Portal
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? ie v4.5.25 / v5.0.30**
v5.1.42
**What environment are you running?**
Self-hosted Git install

**Have you checked log files (storage/logs/) Please provide redacted output**

There are no logs from this activity or otherwise from today.

**Have you searched existing issues?**

Yes, I couldn't find an existing report

**Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting?**

No

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

I have manually made a partial payment in the admin area to an existing invoice. In the admin area, the status of the invoice updated to 'Partial' but the status in the client portal now says 'Overdue'. In the invoices table, the status_id is "3". The due date on the invoice is ~1month in the future. When submitting the payment, I marked the date as 2 days in the past to reflect the date the client made the payment.

**Steps To Reproduce**

Create an invoice with a partial amount due on the current date.
Go to payments, click "+", and select the invoice. Add the partial amount to match the balance due (I tested with bank transfer) and submit.
Check status in invoices, then check client portal status of the same invoice.

**Expected behavior**
The status in the client portal should reflect the status in admin area "Partial".

**Screenshots**
Screens and sql dumps attached

**Additional context**

I had to import all data manually from an earlier database from v5.0 as the migration reported missing tables. It is possible some erroneous data exists (see dumps) - I can provide a complete db if it helps.

**(v5) Can you replicate the issue on our demo site? https://demo.invoiceninja.com**

I don't have time now but will test and update this issue in a few hours.

##### EDIT 14/04/21 12:35
I have tested in the demo site and I can reproduce the scenario. It seems the payment doesn't/is unable to update the invoice status because having a payment applied has locked it. This behaviour is desirable to prevent changes to the invoice contents but the status of the invoice in the client portal should ideally show as "partial" or similar.

This is the logic that makes sense to me:

**"Overdue"** status should show if the total of payments affecting the invoice is less than the balance due and the balance due date is less than the present date **OR** if the total of the payments is equal to or greater than the partial balance due but less than the invoice total due and the invoice total due date is less than the present date.

**"Partial"** status should show when the total payments affecting the invoice is equal to or greater than the balance due but less than the total invoice due and the total invoice due date is greater than the present date.

![admin_area_invoice](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67714557/114698178-b10a0f80-9d16-11eb-8f96-e4384ca7bcd4.png)
![client_area_invoice](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67714557/114698182-b1a2a600-9d16-11eb-8260-279b8a7c12c0.png)
[Downloads.tar.gz](https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/files/6310246/Downloads.tar.gz)

I don't have any such errors in my logs.

title: Payment emails being sent to all contacts, not just selected in invoice
body:
I have updated this issue for v5.5.6 as the behavior seems to have changed.

All contacts for a client get emailed payment emails now regardless of who is selected in the invoice or not.


### Original Post:

v5.3.93.

Payment emails do not get sent to the selected contacts and only get sent to the first contact.

In this example, I have three contacts under a client but I have selected only one of the contacts like so:
![Screenshot 2022-06-01 140022](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52687659/171324938-f230305d-d91a-49eb-bfab-5eb662038867.png)

When I send an invoice, it sends it to ONLY the selected contact which is expected behaviour.

However, for **payment emails**, this is not the case as expected.

As I don't wish to reveal my emails, lets say for this example that:
Top contact is email**1**@company.com
Middle contact is email**2**@company.com
Bottom contact is email**3**@company.com

As you can see in the image, I have selected only email**2**@company.com

When I enter a payment and chose to send the payment email, it ONLY gets sent to email**1**@company.com and not email**2**@company.com or email**3**@company.com.

I expect that because I only selected email**2**@company.com for this invoice that the payment email would only go to that selected contact but instead it goes to only the first contact, which wasn't even selected.

... the invoice is actually listed as overdue, and 0.01 EUR seems to be unpaid. ( 199.01 vs 199.02 EUR).

![2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2114993/22246762/a3522c3c-e236-11e6-93e0-6ee82ec1b5ec.png)
